text: The War on Errorism is the ninth studio album by American punk rock band, NOFX. The War on Errorism was released on May 6, 2003. The producers of the album were Ryan Greene and Fat Mike. The album pokes fun at former U.S. president George W. Bush and criticizes him and his policies. ==Songs== Category:2003 albums Category:NOFX albums Category:Punk albums
title: The War on Errorism
